metadata.synopsis: A reaction to a dead avatar moving an item/touching them.

0.speaker: Shadowheart
0.text: Something's amiss. I feel a presence...
0.context: NodeContext: Mildly spooked (a ghost player did something, like touch her or cause an object to move). Variant for Shar path and anti-shar.
